case.state: Oh hi-- Eh!?
Hi ~player~, how a-- Eh!??
This Shami- Shadow Mistress has come to play!
I'm Shami-- wait, do we need to introduce ourselves?
Should we wait a little bit longer? I wouldn't want to start before everyone's here.
Hello ~opponent~! Now we just need to wait for the rest. O-Or maybe not?
Wow, is it Demon's Night at the Inventory?
Wait... did pair us up just because we're all demons? Hm... thank you?
Oh God! I'm surrounded by Magical Girls on all sides!
W-Wow, it sure is nice we're playing in the m-middle of a Magical Girl cosplaying convention, huh.
I'm glad we have everyone here. Games are always more fun with more players.
It's nice to see everyone here. Even if it means I'm more likely to lose, ehehe...
strip poker... right up a demon's alley.
This is definitely the type of game a demon needs to get stronger!
Let's... just stick with this.
I kinda want a break from thinking about my cards.
Huh, what were we doing? Oh, well just this is fine.
Maybe I should just trust in what I already have.
Ugh, if I touch them I could mess them up...
Come on lucky number ~cards~.
All I need is ~cards~. Or... something like that.
Let's hope this is enough.
I'll take, uh, ~cards~ cards, that's a good number, right?
One! No wait, two? Um, um...
This'll be my hand!
What do I do, what do I do?
So I should take... that one?
Ohhh, so I hand some of them back... and get new ones!
So... if I hand some of my cards back, I can get better ones?
Aww, did you know today was my birthday? I'm so happy!
Wow, did you throw this party because it's my birthday today? ...I think you spelled my name wrong back there, but that's okay! I'm still happy.
Hehehe... what type of cards do I have? You'll just have to wait and see.
W-What do I do? I don't want to waste these!
Woah! there's so many drinks here. I usually just drink the sports drinks Momo gives me after training.
Hm, it feels a little strange to do something without Momo or Mikan. Not that I'm not having fun.
(Can't stop smiling!)
(If I look at my cards, I'll smile and give it away!) U-Um... oh yeah, I have... cards.
Y-Yes!
Hehehe, you could say I have the devil's luck.
A queen's kinda like a mistress, right?
(I bet Ogura could figure out what to do with these. She's super smart.)
Just gotta win the next one and I'll go from there.
You're supposed to hide your feelings in poker, right? What if my tail gives me away?
You... you all better watch out, because the Shami- Shadow Mistress is coming to play this round! (Ergh.)
I'll try not to drop any cards between my chest.
I guess this form does make me better at poker!
You're not taking pity on me, are you?
The Crisis Management Form lives another day!
W-Well... I think you all have another round to stare at me like this... yay...
I like playing in here, I'm all toasty even wearing this.
I'm glad we're playing in here, I'd be a Shami-cicle out there.
This place is so big and open! I bet if I yelled my name it would echo around!
Oh god, what if I knocked something expensive over with my tail by accident. Would the owners want me to pay for it!?
You're supposed to lie in this type of game, right? Isn't that kind of rude?
Hm, should I be taking notes right now? Oh wait! I completely forgot my notebook, ehehe…
I've heard folding is something you do in poker, but why? Wouldn't that just damage the cards?
I may not know what to do with these, but I won't let that stop me!
I should have come with a plan. My head's already spinning.
Hm, usually when I'm unsure of something I go to Momo... but she's not here...
I guess cards like these are a good reason to think. I'll become a brainy demon!
If I think of these cards like an order at the cafe... I wonder if it would be easier to remember which ones to keep.
Hm...
Oh... hehehe.
M-Maybe I should take my time with these...
(What to do, what to do...?)
(Let this be my hand, let this be my hand...!)
I-If I keep saying stuff like `this'll be fine', e-eventually I'll believe it, right?
Couldn't I have had something cut and dry? Not knowing feels really bad, y'know!
O-Only one way to find out if I'll survive.
This game makes me feel like my brain is taking an 11 km sprint sometimes...
My head feels way clearer when I wear the Crisis Management form, so I'm sure I can figure out a winning strategy with these.
I never thought I'd find someplace where this outfit actually seemed appropriate.
I-I know I'm wearing... this, but I swear I'm not some sort of exhibitionist.
Is it just me, or is ~player~ kinda... see-through?
I'm definitely going to win this one! Or maybe lose...
What even is a spade?
I'm not sure what to do with these, so I think I'll just wonder about what I'm going to eat when I get back.
Ooh! I know, I'm not very good at Poker, so maybe I could show one of you guys my hand and get some advice!
Why are there all these letters? Is the alphabet worth more or less than the numbers?
Is this really someone's bedroom? It must be nice to have all this space to yourself.
That bed looks so big and comfy... I'm getting sleepy just looking at it.
W-Why did I decide to transform into this when it's s-s-sooo c-cold!
N-Now I remember w-why I never transform in the cold!
Ah you know, these are f-fine, I can totally make them work.
I got so distracted looking at the designs on the cards, I didn't even think about which ones to keep...
Feels worse than someone stepping on my tail.
My tail just has no energy now...
You ever bite down on a fresh pancake, only to taste leftover rice and tofu? That's how I'm feeling right now.
Ugh, how do I win...
Maybe this is more complex than I thought.
Mngh...!
Hey... so, um, hypothetically, if a player were to accidentally drop all her cards, could the game be paused so she-- they, could fix it?
Do I really have to lie? I feel that would leave me with a bad con--, con-- con-science?
Ugh, I tried really hard to remember all the rules, but I keep getting them mixed up in my head...
Your timing is the worst, you know that, dealer?
Wait, are bad cards... actually good in this game? (My head's spinning.)
I can't be stressed if I just don't look at my cards.
D-Don't you know, a demon is always stronger when she's backed into a corner!
(Remember, it goes strip, lose, forfeit. Strip, lose, forfeit. Strip, forfeit, lose.) Huh, I feel like I messed something up.
Oh dear father who art sealed within a box...
These boots aren't very comfortable to stand in for a while.
Not feeling very magical right now.
Ugh, now that my head's all clear, I understand how bad these cards are!
I-I promise I'm not hiding a card up these poofy sleeves!
Ergh, guess I should start getting my catchphrase ready.
Thanks, but ever since these horns and tail popped in, I haven't felt sick at all!
That's so nice! But ever since I got these horns, I haven't been in the hospital once!
I mean, getting more comfortable with nudity and thinking is exactly what any demon girl needs to beat her fri-- nem--, fremesis, right?

I don't know if I mentioned it, but my ancestor actually lives with me! Yep, she's stuck in a small statue, but I carry her around with me and she gives me advice. That... would have been helpful now, actually.
I wish my Ancestor were here. Even though she got sealed in a small statue, she knows all sorts of things. It's too bad I sorta... forgot her at home. Hope she isn't too upset...
I never thought about it, but you're right! Thanks Dealer!
Hm, I didn't even notice the Dealer before now, but you're right! Thanks Dealer!
Oh... well, this one time I had a dream where I was trapped in a hospital and was being chased by a whole bunch of walking medical equipment!
I... mostly see other people's bad dreams, but there was this one time where I was trapped in a hospital... I didn't like that dream.
Ooh, that's easy! I want to get stronger so I can protect my town! That's it! I mean it!
I-I just want to get stronger so Momo will be my vassal, and not just in spirit! T-That's all! D-Don't go looking for more!
W-Well... I'd like he-- them to be someone strong, dependable, maybe a bit quiet, b-but also assertive sometimes. Is that too much?
Hm, looks are nice, but I think what the person is like matters more. She should be strong and dependable after all.
Just you and me ~player~. You know, I finally think I'm starting to understand you.
I still can't really get a read on you at all ~player~, but still, I think I'm finally starting to get you a bit.
Hey, could I ask you a question? How many people use Social Media, exactly? It's really hard finding... certain accounts.
Wikipedia knows a ton of stuff, right? So could you tell me what's the best way to get an advantage over a Magical Girl?
Oh! I know there's plenty of info on Wikipedia, so I was wondering if you had anything on properly using magical inherited staffs?
There's been something I've been wondering about, and I think you may have the answer! Does Wikipedia have any info on the Light Clan?
Well... there was a right turn on a right turn, then a left. I'm pretty sure a summoning circle was involved? A-And that was just leaving the city!
Hm, well I think I had to take two right turns, then a roundabout into a left. I-I think I had to travel through a trick wall? Gah! I'm getting it all confused!
Hm, I never really thought much about it. I can make great udon. That's important in a relationship, right?
This outfit's not just for show you know. It makes me stronger! Like being able to climb up two flights of stairs without getting winded, or taking a test without getting distracted.

It may look... strange, but this outfit's pretty useful. All I have to do is yell "crisis management", and I'm capable of doing things I couldn't before, like playing video games for too long without my eyes hurting.
They serve drinks here, right? I wonder if I could get some citrussy, for Mikan's sake!
Oh yeah, I guess there aren't a lot of demons here. Where I come from--Tama city--is a special safe space for demons, so it's not uncommon to see one of us walking down the street, or running a cafe!
(For some reason, I'm tempted to ask everyone what their order is.)
Bars are kinda like cafes, right?
Ow ow ow, how come no one ever told me sand is hot!
Ah! The Crisis Management Form is not designed for sand, my boots are sinking!
Swimming seems like it would be fun, but this isn't really a swim suit.
Woah! who's birthday is it? Is it yours ~player~!?
H-How am I supposed to concentrate with that cake back there...
Woah! The moon is so pretty! Not that I see it looking at you, ~player~, but I'm sure it is!
Every time I'm on a roof, I kinda worry about falling off of it. Does that happen to anyone else?
This hand! It’s uh, that super rare, um, whatchamacallit type of hand!
It's nice to see another demon here. I didn't think I'd see another one outside my home--Tama City--It was made as a special safe spot for demons so there are plenty of us there.
C'mon, wearing this doesn't embarrass me. W-Well, it does actually, but I just gotta... fake it till I make it!
Cards make more sense now!
...Just do this... and maybe that?
Ugh, these garters kinda pinch. It's distracting!
Hmph, it should be against the rules to bring food here, I-I can't play when I'm distracted like this!
N-No one better try to bribe me to lose on purpose with food, alright? I-It definitely won't work, okay!?
Woah, a monster! I'm always rooting for you guys in the movies!
Isn't it unfair that the undead never win in the movies? They're trying their hardest too!
Woah a ninja... Wait! Shouldn't you be hidden right now!
Woah, a real life ninja! Can you walk on water? Or disappear into a leaf!?
Are you feeling the pressure?, B-Because I sure am...
(Hey, ~psychic~, can you hear this? Can you tell what I'm thinking!)
(HEY, ~PSYCHIC~, I CAN USE TELEPATHY TOO. I"M NOT VERY GOOD AT CONTROLLING MY VOLUME YET. SORRY!)
Oh! I actually have my own magic wand, I call it the Whatchamacallit rod! Oh, ~wand~, we should have a wand-off!
Seeing your wand reminded me of my own, ~wand~. If only I didn't forget it at home.
I mentioned a... fremesis, right? That's Momo, she's a peach-colored Magical Girl who I've know for a while now. B-But just to be clear, w-we're nemeses over friends, okay?

Er, if I mentioned a... fremesis earlier, that's Momo. She's a peach-colored Magical Girl who's... done a lot for me, so I've got to be strong enough to match her. Even if means playing games like this.

My... friend, Momo she mostly uses magic to change her clothes. Well... it's more like transform; there's even a whole flashy sequence to it! I can do it too, but, ugh, here's hoping I won't have to, It's pretty embarrassing.
You know, my name isn't even Shamiko, it's Yuko! But only my mom calls me that anymore. Does anyone else have a nickname like that?
You know, my name is actually Yuko, but it feels weird to be called anything other than Shamiko. Does anyone else have a nickname like that?
Why do they call it "poker" anyway?
I wonder who came up with designs on these cards. I think I'd like to see the process.
I usually like my games more... pixelly. But strip poker's actually pretty fun.
(I wonder if ~player~ will let me look at ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ cards?)
(I wonder what Momo would want for lunch tomorrow, Udon? No I made that for her yesterday.)
Oooh, they're called "hands" because that's where I hold them, right?
Hehehe... I bet I could cheat by holding some cards behind my back with my tail! Ugh, but I'd feel so bad after.
You know, it's so common to see stuff like cafes run by demons or magical girls walking down the street that most people don't even blink at them. Yet I've never seen something like this place there.
(Is this a dream? No, can't be, Momo's not here.)
(I wonder if anyone here has a mind reading power. Hey! Blink twice if you're hearing this.)
I wonder if I'd have better luck at some other type of strip game. I'm only really good at video games though...
Hm, maybe I'm imagining it, but I swear I can feel someone's eyes on me occasionally.
(Is ~player~ looking at me? Or is ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ looking at everyone... some how.)
They serve drinks here, right? I wonder if I could get something citrusy, for Mikan's sake!
Is anyone else hungry? Maybe I should have brought some snacks.
Oh crap, we're not making any bets are we? Because I'm completely out of money.
Hehehe... I've been working on my "poker tail". It won't give away anything!
My school uniform may not look very interesting, but it's super comfy. I wear it a lot, even though I'm not at school anymore.
Sure. Ooh! Is it about my horns? My tail? Something else I haven't thought of?
Go ahead? Ooh! Can I guess what about? My horns and tail? My general demonic aura? Something else?
But... that's a good thing, isn't it? Just cause I'm a demon doesn't mean I should be totally demonic.

condition.saying: Tarak has propaganda showing women as demons. If you're the real thing, they wouldn't be too frightened.

case.state: Hey, I could be plenty frightening if I wanted to! Not that I do, but that's not bad, is it?
I-I don't want to do any of that! I got these horns and tail, isn't that enough!?
R-Really? I thought being a demon was just about having these horns and tail. I really hope it is, because I really don't want to be... all that.
U-Um... no? I'm not really sure I get what you mean. Your words are nice, but your tone's all mean.
I-I've never done anything like that! I don't even get what you mean. You're words are nice but you're saying it all mean.
Of course I'm a demon. I wouldn't have these horns and tail otherwise, right?
Um, yeah, last time I checked. Why else would I have these horns and tail?
They sure are! I didn't believe it at first either. It was really surprising when they popped in!
Mmhm, they popped onto me a while back. I was so surprised, I didn't believe it at first either.
Yes... well, a little bit. I'm not the best at it.
I-I can, but only a little bit. If I push myself, I get all tired.
I-I-I'm not trying to do anything! P-Please don't point that very magical girl looking staff at me!
I-I swear, I'm just your average, everyday demon! P-Please don't use some sort of special attack on me!
Yeah, I am. I didn't glue these horns to my head after all, that would be silly.
'Course I am. Otherwise I have no idea how I'd keep this tail attached.
...Rank? Like in a videogame? I'm not sure. I've heard my father was a great demon, but I think I'm only around level 7. So pretty normal I think.
Huh? ...Rank? Like in an old RPG? I don't really know. I heard my father was a great demon, but I'm just regular old Shamiko.
Me neither, I'm usually with my magical girl... allies. We could be demonic friends if you wanted!
Hm, now that I think about it, I've also only met one or two other demons... hm, well we could be demonic friends if you wanted to.
Oh, um, I like to cook, sometimes I play video games, oh and sometimes I get caught up in all kinds of crazy things around town.
Well sometimes I help with cooking, or I do some training, and I usually get in the middle of some crazy business around town.
W-Well, I still want to be all that, but if I was a better demon, I'd be able to protect those I care for better.
I-I don't want to lose all that, but if I were a better demon I could repay everyone who has protected me in the past.
Wha-- hey! Of course I'm a real demon! I even have a whole bunch of demonic subordinates to prove it!
Of course I'm a real demon! If these horns aren't enough to prove it, the how about my group of subordinates? How's that for demonic!
T-Than-- wait, what was that about demons?
Oh, um, thanks... b-but what did you say you do to demons?
Wha--! That's not very nice! I'm sure you wouldn't say that if you knew me well!
Hey! What'd I ever do to you! Y-You barely know me!
I-I can't leave until I've done what I came here for. E-Even if you tell me in that kinda scary voice.
H-Hey! My tail is my pride as a demon, and I can control it just fine! T-Though I can think of one person I would want to slap...
Even if that were true, I can control it easily! Most of the time! B-But I'm starting to think of one person who I may want to hit...
Oh... you're concerned about me now? Well, don't worry, Momo explained the route multiple times and even gave me a note. I should... probably be fine.
Well... I guess it's better if you're concerned then angry... Don't worry though, I had it explained multiple times. I won't forget! Probably!
Yeah, like I said! I have to be better at dealing with... demon-y stuff, like nudity, a-and also dealing with people like you, w-which is a lot harder than I-I thought it'd be!
E-Even if my legs are telling me to run right now, I have to get better at dealing with... demon-y things! A-And being around people like you, which makes me want to run even more!
H-Hey, these are mine, and they're super comfortable, m-maybe you would like some of your own?
N-No, these are mine, it's my only set actually. Though maybe I could get you one? T-They're super comfy!
I'm a genuine demon girl. These horns wouldn't come out even if you pulled on them. Though... I've been hearing that question a lot recently. Are demons really that rare?
Yep, I'm a real demon girl, not just some cosplayer. I have to ask, though: Are horns like mine really that rare? I've been hearing that question a lot.
Wha-- hey! I've been... mostly healthy ever since I got these horns, a-and I train every day! That has to count for something!
I'm not that weak! I-I mean sure I can't use magic very long or I pass out, b-but I train everyday! I-I'll be a strong demon eventually!
Yeah actually, tails and horns run on my dad's side. It even goes way, way back to my ancestor!
Yep! Or my dad did at least, and probably his dad too. It stretches waaay back to my ancestor!
Gasp, can you do something similar!? A ship pilot who can use magic!? That's so cool!
Yeah, I think that's how it works, but-- Gasp, can you use magic too!? That'd be so cool!
Woah! I can almost see it in my head! It almost makes me want one myself!
Wow, that perfectly appeals to my demonic tendencies! I almost want to pilot one myself!
Oh you know, just you average, everyday demon girl. I guess you've never seen one before?
I'm just your regular, everyday demon girl. I uh, assume you don't see too many where you're from?
Uh... thanks. I'm glad I'm more of a fluffy dream than a nightmare, even if it goes against my demonic tendencies a little.
Well... thank you. I'm happy I'm more of sweet dream than a scary one, but I think it stings my demonic pride a bit, ehehe...
Hah! I just got here and I already have a new fan, and one with great dark vibes! I'll gladly accept you!
Wow, I didn't think I'd find a fan here so soon! Especially one with amazing dark vibes! You can definitely be my fan!
Really? Then… gasp do you know any demonic magic you could teach me!?
You will!? There's so much I want to ask. Like, um, do you have any demon magic you could teach me!?
Ahaha, yeah... when they first grew in the neck pain was unbelievable! They don't make for a very good bag hook either...
Huhuhu, how else would this Shami- shadow mistress get so many fri- subordinates. By... pretending, of course, yes.
Really!? You would!? I've never had a castle lunch before. I bet food tastes extra delicious just being in one!
Erk... that exaggeration is still making the rounds, I see. Momo's not enslaved, just sorta my vassal... in spirit. B-But um, cooking for her seemed to help. Her diet goes to Hell if I'm not around!
Eeeee! Y-yes Ma'am! I'll do better next time(This must be true demonic authority!)
D-Don't worry, Shrine Maiden, I'm not here for anything bad! I-I wouldn't want to be hit with your... Wait isn't stopping children's crying a good thing?
Y-You don't need to worry about that, I-I'm here for... completely wholesome diabolical reasons! And wait, isn't stopping someone's crying super nice?
A-Actually as a Shadow Mistress, I'm the one with the familiars... or friends, o-or... whatever you call them! And I give great benefits!
Hmph, as a demonic mistress, I have plenty of contracts. I offer great benefits to my frie-- familiars. Like free laundry on Sundays.
Neither! I'm an 100% natural demon girl! I-I don't even know how I would plug it in. N-Not that it matters.
Hmph! This isn't some cosplay! I'm an actual demon girl! A-And I don't even know how I would plug a tail in!

I-I'm sorry, but I need whatever advantage I can get!
C-CRISIS MANAGEMENT FORM!
Don't worry, I won't accidentally stab my tail. That's something you only do once... twice.
Woah... I didn't know there were so many types of weapons. There's a sword... and an axe, and-- oh sorry, I'm meant to strip.
Okay, maybe I should have read the rules better.
Uh, anyone have any tips? I... may not really know how to play poker.
But I wanted to see how long I could keep it going...
Just like that!?
I-I'll be back before you know it.
Guess it was too good to last...
It's alright, I just got a new record to beat.
All dreams have to end.
I-I guess the Crisis Management Form can only take me so far.
How's that for crisis managing?
H-How do I make taking off my clothes interesting?
Well, I guess it had to happen sooner or later.
No chance anyone wants to volunteer for me? No? Okay...
If you think about it, this is really like trying on clothes in a fitting room but backwards!

Yawn.
Feeling kinda drained. Ah! Sorry, I'll get on with it.
It's weird... I'm so used to weird stuff like curses or going into dreams that just playing a card game feels... weird. I'll... probably get used to it.
I-If you think about it, the goal is really just to lose your clothes, so this is basically winning, I think.
Ooh! What if we thought of strip poker like a race!
Go! Magic strip! ...Just kidding. For now, anyway.
Yeah, I'm starting to think I should have prepared more before doing this.
I may be losing, but don't feel bad for me, aright!?
A-Anyone have any tips...?
I-I'll get you back for this! (Perfectly demonic comeback line!)
I-I'm not out just yet...
I-I knew I was in over my head!
Argh, alright. But no one better try to step on my tail while I'm doing this, okay!?
A demon gets stronger with every loss. But I'm not really feeling stronger!
You can have fun, while still losing!? This is a whole new world for me!
Mngh, don't get greedy, alright?
I guess... I'm getting used to it, huh?
I-It's getting kinda heated, but I wish I could cool down.
You-you haven't won just yet!
T-This really is a crisis!
B-But, I thought I was supposed to be smarter with the Crisis Management Form?
Well, mine are usually... fruitier then ~magGirl~. A-And I don't usually hang out with them. They're my eternal nemeses, just... we have a little truce going on right now.
Wha-- hey! Am I not demonic enough for you? 'Cause I can be plenty demonic!
Wha-- don't look down on me! I don't mind being called cute, but I could be plenty demonic if I wanted to!
W-Well... a demon should live greedily, right? So it only makes sense I should try to get stronger so I can accomplish everything I want.
I guess it sounds...odd, but I'm still living greedily like a demon should! Even if it just means completing all my goals.
Of course not! These horns are way too heavy for me to choose to choose to wear them!
Hm... I guess, but how? Tape would wear out, and... Wait, y-you don't mean...?
I agree! W-Wait, I'm cute?
That's so nice! B-But wait, you think I'm cute?
Spicy? Hm, I think it's more... zesty, actually. But sometimes, it does feel like the heat is being turned up.
They usually feel more... sour followed by sweet rather than spicy. But there are times when I feel I'm being grilled during them.
Great! Now... do we have to swap numbers or something like that?
I'm so glad! Now do we have to swap phone numbers? O-Or what's next?
Of course they are! Have you never met one? ...I'm almost jealous.
Y-You've really never met a Magical Girl? Guess you haven't had to deal with any curses either... I'm almost jealous.
H-Huh? I-I didn't know there'd be a test! Um, okay! I've only been a demon for a little while, a-and I can't do much, so I'm harmless! Basically! W-Was that enough words?
Ahhh! A pop quiz! Um, um, well, I'm basically harmless, right? I-I mean I'm trying to get stronger, to help people I mean! B-But I still don't know too much. D-Did I reach the minimum word count?
Y-Yeah, well... so what! Even if I'm pathetic, at least I'm trying to improve!
W-Well, that may be true now. But maybe I'll grow when you're not looking!
Eeek! A-All I want is to get better with stripping, and nudity, a-and demon-y stuff, to get tougher, you know? T-That's it!
Eeek! I-I know a demon like me should be good at a place like this, but I'm really not good with stripping, and nudity and stuff like that. I-I just want some experience! T-That's it!
T-That's not nice at all then! Well then... I hope the same happens to you! Y-Yeah!
Whuh-- huh!? T-Then I guess I hope you get lost on the way back too!
Well... I, uh, huh, I guess it's like how you move your arms back and forth when you walk, you know?
Well... I haven't thought about it too much, but I guess... you know when you're walking and your arms move even though you didn't mean to? It's like that, I guess.
Oh, I got it. You're an exhibitionist? But you're also a Goddess? How do those two fit together?
Hmm, maybe? People throw away a whole bunch of nice stuff. With a bit of fixing-upping, you could probably have something great! Probably not as comfy as this uniform though.
I-I would love to! B-But I can't because... b-because this is really good training! Yeah! J-Just keep saying stuff like that!
R-Really, that sounds great, but I really can't, um, because... because this is great emotion training! Y-Yeah! Just keep hitting me with stuff like t-that.
...Why? If anything, I think she'd look even better with horns! D-Don't tell her I said that though.
Really? I think my mom would look really nice if she had horns. M-Maybe keep that between us though.
You sound just like my boss. He says I got a ton of... what was it again? Oh right, potential! The pressure can be a little scary though...
My boss said something similar. He said I have a bunch of... potential I think it was. I-It's nice to hear, but a little scary too.
R-Really? Where I'm from, there's a lot of demons and magical girls. All kinds of crazy stuff happens, but everyone just finds it normal...
Oh... Where I live, there are a lot of demons and other magic... things. It causes a whole bunch of crazy things to go down, but no one ever seems to have a problem with it...
